§ 3136. Regulations The Office of Personnel Management shall prescribe regulations to carry out the purpose of this subchapter. (Added Pub. L. 95–454, title IV, § 402(a), Oct. 13, 1978, 92 Stat. 1160.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective 9 months after Oct. 13, 1978, and congressional review of provisions of sections 401 through 412 of Pub. L. 95–454, see section 415(a)(1), (b), of Pub. L. 95–454, set out as a note under section 3131 of this title.
